mapper.insert: insert into t_member( mem_id, mem_pw, mem_email, mem_name) values (#{mem_id}, #{mem_pw}, #{mem_email}, #{mem_name})
mapper.select: select count(*) from t_member where mem_id = #{mem_id}
mapper.insert: insert into t_follow( follow_seq, to_mem, from_mem ) values(t_follow_seq.NEXTVAL, #{to_mem}, #{from_mem})
insert into t_cmt ( cmt_seq, post_seq, mem_id, cmt_content ) values(t_cmt_seq.nextval, #{post_seq}, #{mem_id}, #{cmt_content})
insert into t_like( like_seq, post_seq, mem_id ) values(t_like_seq.nextval,#{post_seq},#{mem_id})
